author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two persons who were injured in a road accident near Pazhavoor in the district on Saturday succumbed to injuries in the hospital on Sunday.

Police said T. Navamani (45) of Aavaraikulam and Kovilpillai (65) of the same area were going to Anjugramam in a bike on Saturday afternoon. When they reached Ambalavanapuram intersection, a speeding car hit the bike to seriously injure the duo, who were admitted to the Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital. They succumbed to injuries on Sunday.

Pazhavoor police have registered a case.
title: Two persons succumb to injuries
